trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs> class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs>類別用於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>事件。

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: 此類別中有兩個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>屬性可讓您刪除或修改預設和自訂圖例項目，以及將自訂圖例項目。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可用來變更圖例項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>屬性用來識別圖例引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: 圖例名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> 和圖例名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 用來移除、修改或變更 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> 事件中自訂和預設圖例項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: 也可以用來加入自訂圖例項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>屬性可讓您刪除或修改預設和自訂圖例項目中的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>事件，並且新增自訂圖例項目。

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: 也可以變更圖例項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName> properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName>屬性可以用來決定預設的圖例項目相關聯的資料元素。

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性會傳回零長度字串的自訂圖例項目，因為自訂項目不是圖表資料相關聯。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可讓您判斷哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>引發事件，可讓您自訂個別<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> 物件的名稱，這個物件可用來判斷哪個圖例是 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> 事件的傳送者。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值，表示關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> 物件名稱。
